1.heading: Truman.
1.title: The Blank in the Comics strip collection includes a file of one or more daily comic strips related to this keyword or topic. Call no.: PN6726 f.B55
1.author: [No author]

2.heading: Truman.
2.title: "Here's Your Half of the Cookie, Oscar"
2.author: by Frank Cho.
notes: Summary: Truman relents and gives him half the cookie, and Oscar tricks him out of the other half.

3.heading: Truman.
3.title: "Hi Ho Silver, Awaaaaaay!?"
3.author: by Frank Cho.
notes: Summary: Truman's reading a Lone Ranger book, and gets an idea (complete with light bulb) to ride Oscar like a horse.

4.heading: Truman.
4.title: "Millions of Dogs are Neutered Every Year"
4.author: by Frank Cho.
notes: Summary: Brandy tries to reassure Truman that Oscar will be okay.

5.heading: Truman.
5.title: "Oh, All Right, You Can Have a Bite"
5.author: by Frank Cho.
notes: Summary: Brandy has given Truman a cookie, and he teases Oscar with it.

6.heading: Truman.
6.title: "Ready Or Not, Here I Come!"
6.author: by Frank Cho.
notes: Summary: Truman and Oscar are playing hide and go seek; Oscar startles Truman up a tree.

7.heading: Truman.
7.title: "You're a Swell Wiener Doggie, Oscar, but you make one Lousy Pirate"
7.author: by Frank Cho.
notes: Summary: Truman's playing pirate, and Oscar gives him a big friendly lick on the face.
